title: Celebrities Congratulate Karan Johar On Becoming A Dad
text:
Rashmi Daryanani Mar . 6 . 2017 Karan Johar 
On Sunday morning, Karan Johar officially announced to the world that he‚Äôd become a dad to twins, Yash and Roohi . We bet it‚Äôs an incredibly happy time for him, and it‚Äôs a testament to the kind of bonds he‚Äôs created in the industry that so many people came out to congratulate him on the amazing news. Take a look at what celebrities tweeted once the news broke: Karan your the best human being I know and Im sure you will make the best dad.Can't wait to meet these lil munchkins https://t.co/iDl4XswvRG
